content.raw:
Thanks alot, Aric and I'm glad you've had your first success! I certainly did not wait 20-30 mins. Perhaps it was just my impatience... I'll try again. 

My questions are still valid though. I think it is a relatively easy effort once you know what to do, and it is much easier for OSRF to share the details with us instead of us trying to reverse engineer / guesstimate them (both for replicating cloudsim setup locally and on AWS outside the cloudsim).
content.html:
Thanks alot, Aric and I'm glad you've had your first success! I certainly did not wait 20-30 mins. Perhaps it was just my impatience... I'll try again.

My questions are still valid though. I think it is a relatively easy effort once you know what to do, and it is much easier for OSRF to share the details with us instead of us trying to reverse engineer / guesstimate them (both for replicating cloudsim setup locally and on AWS outside the cloudsim).
